AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Homely Shinobi
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a homely shinobi. She used her talents to create a peaceful and nurturing environment at home.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Fearsome Shinobi
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a a master of stealth and assassination.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Haiku Samurai
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a samurai and a poet.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Versatile Samurai
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a samurai. She seamlessly blends traditional martial art skills with cutting-edge technology, like laser muskets.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Winner Salaryman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a consumable, but successful corporate manager.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Normal Salaryman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a consumable salaryman. Her passion for botany exceeds her interest in daily work.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Loser Salaryman
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an unemployed salaryman. She found solace in the companionship of her cat, the only one who truly loves her.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Construction Worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an employee of a construction company. She managed to stealing and selling company assets.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Revolutionary Worker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a fervent revolutionary proletariat. Formerly a laborer in the mining industry, she has become an expert in crafting homemade bombs.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Punk
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a local gangster, who has a knack for shooting and a swagger that says she's the next rap queen.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Unlicensed Doctor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a doctor, with a 50% chance of saving lives or ending them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sewer Dweller
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a homeless person in the depths of the city's underbelly, hunting bio-rats to sustain herself.
